name: Microvist
0:
”Alexa, ask Microvist to give me a random challenge”
”Give me another challenge”
”Give me an eco tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: microvist
des:
The Microvist skill helps you to make small, positive, individual changes for the planet. Ask Microvist for a challenge to inspire you and try something that can help the environment.

Based on https://microvist.com, the challenges focus on living more sustainably. Whether it's beating climate change, tackling waste or biodiversity there's challenges for everyone. Going green made fun and approachable!

Some challenges are one-of changes, while others are weekly, that in turn, form good habits. We know whatever you do, that every little step in the right direction adds up.

Not up-to committing to a challenge? Ask the Microvist skill for a tip instead. Small handy tidbits about living a more eco friendly life.

Head to https://microvist.com for more details on each of the challenges. Join the community with badges to unlock & group challenges to take part in.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
